attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2025-0628

Date: 2025-08-28

Whereas the South Surrey and White Rock Chamber of Commerce, in British Columbia, whose certificate of formation was recorded under the Boards of Trade Act on September 8, 1937, has ceased to exercise its franchises;


Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, dissolves the South Surrey and White Rock Chamber of Commerce under section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act.




Attendu que la South Surrey and White Rock Chamber of Commerce (Colombie-Britannique), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 8 septembre 1937, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,


À ces causes, sur recommandation de la ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout la South Surrey and White Rock Chamber of Commerce.
